translate([0,0,1]){
difference(){
    cube([150,100,2],true);
    cube([130,80,2.1],true);
}}
   linear_extrude(2){ translate([-65,-40.5,0])
text("LOVE", size=20, font="Liberation Sans:style=Bold Italic");}

fudge = 0.1;

module poly_path4529(h)
{
  scale([25.4/90, -25.4/90, 1]) union()
  {
    linear_extrude(height=h)
      polygon([[32.794700,-58.310514],[32.327315,-61.738003],[32.171522,-64.542309],[32.483109,-65.944464],[34.664240,-69.995131],[35.443213,-71.397283],[36.689574,-74.513180],[37.156959,-76.071128],[37.001161,-76.694311],[36.533776,-77.473283],[35.131625,-80.900772],[33.885264,-83.549284],[32.950494,-85.107233],[31.660830,-86.224821],[30.146188,-86.976773],[29.523009,-86.976773],[27.965061,-88.067336],[26.407112,-88.378924],[25.316548,-88.378924],[23.914393,-87.444158],[22.823830,-87.132566],[21.577469,-87.755745],[19.863726,-88.067336],[18.620537,-87.607306],[17.526801,-86.820975],[16.373887,-85.604076],[15.501468,-84.172463],[15.034086,-82.147129],[15.968853,-81.056566],[17.682599,-79.498617],[15.657265,-75.759541],[15.657265,-74.980565],[13.943519,-74.824771],[14.255110,-72.799437],[15.345674,-70.618310],[14.722495,-69.216155],[14.722495,-68.592976],[15.345674,-68.281385],[16.436238,-67.814000],[16.436238,-67.190821],[17.059417,-66.411849],[16.280444,-65.632873],[16.280444,-64.853900],[16.903623,-64.386515],[17.371008,-63.607539],[16.592035,-62.672769],[17.215214,-61.893797],[18.773162,-60.959027],[20.642699,-61.114821]]);
  }
}

{

{

  {
    difference()
    {
       linear_extrude(height=h)
         polygon([[4.476524,0.424216],[34.765542,16.345690],[34.765542,21.976214],[33.794761,29.548296],[33.794761,32.266482],[31.659046,36.732068],[32.435670,38.480155],[31.853199,40.033403],[32.047356,44.110679],[32.629823,45.663927],[32.047356,50.129514],[30.688265,55.371724],[29.717485,57.895753],[28.552551,60.225624],[28.164237,68.575016],[27.193456,73.817227],[24.863584,77.506189],[24.669431,78.671127],[27.193456,82.748400],[28.552551,85.466585],[28.164237,87.408143],[24.475274,88.378924],[22.145403,88.378924],[18.650593,86.825676],[15.932411,83.525024],[15.155105,83.330870],[15.155105,79.641904],[16.320722,78.088656],[15.155105,77.700346],[14.184324,79.059437],[14.766791,82.165933],[12.242763,83.719181],[10.883672,85.660742],[8.553800,86.243209],[4.282370,87.019833],[1.758342,86.243209],[1.758342,84.689961],[3.311590,80.418528],[4.088214,79.641904],[5.835618,75.176318],[6.612242,74.399694],[5.641461,73.428913],[5.641461,72.846446],[4.088214,70.516574],[2.729123,61.778872],[2.146652,53.624323],[2.146652,46.246394],[2.729123,43.916523],[1.952499,43.334056],[2.923276,40.615870],[2.340809,38.674312],[2.923276,17.510628],[3.311590,2.365778],[4.476524,0.424216]]);

module pointings(h)
{

poly_path4529(h);
poly_path4531(h);
poly_path3359(h);
}


translate([50,-20,0])
pointings(2);
